mapper.select:
select DISTINCT jca.car_id, jca.car_number1 from jy_shiping_order ji left join jy_order_custom joc on ji.custom_id=joc.custom_id left join jy_customer js on joc.customer_id=js.customer_id left join jy_sign_order jo on ji.shiping_order_id=jo.order_id left join jy_agreementtoorder ja on ji.shiping_order_id=ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca on ja.agreement_id=jca.agreement_id left join jy_company jc on jca.company_id=jc.company_id where 1=1
and jca.car_number1 like"%${_parameter}%"

SELECT DISTINCT jc.customer_id, jc.customer_name FROM jy_customer jc
LEFT JOIN jy_order_custom joc ON joc.customer_id=jc.customer_id LEFT JOIN jy_shiping_order jso ON jso.custom_id=joc.custom_id where 1=1
and jc.customer_name like "%${_parameter}%"

select DISTINCT joc.custom_id, joc.car_number from jy_shiping_order ji left join jy_sign_order jso on ji.shiping_order_id=jso.order_id left join jy_order_custom joc on ji.custom_id=joc.custom_id left join jy_agreementtoorder ja on ji.shiping_order_id=ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca on ja.agreement_id=jca.agreement_id where shipping_order_state=4 and send_type=0
and joc.car_number like "%${_parameter}%"

select DISTINCT jca.car_id, jca.car_number1 from jy_shiping_order ji left join jy_sign_order jso on ji.shiping_order_id=jso.order_id left join jy_order_custom joc on ji.custom_id=joc.custom_id inner join jy_agreementtoorder ja on ji.shiping_order_id=ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca on ja.agreement_id=jca.agreement_id
where jca.agreement_type=2 and send_type!=0
and jca.car_number1 like"%${_parameter}%"

select DISTINCT jc.company_id, jc.company_name from jy_shiping_order ji left join jy_order_custom joc on ji.custom_id=joc.custom_id inner join jy_agreementtoorder ja on ji.shiping_order_id=ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca on ja.agreement_id=jca.agreement_id left join jy_company jc on jc.company_id=jca.company_id
where jca.agreement_type=2 and send_type!=0
and jc.company_name like "%${_parameter}%"

select DISTINCT jca.car_id, jca.car_number1 from jy_shiping_order ji left join jy_sign_order jso on ji.shiping_order_id=jso.order_id left join jy_order_custom joc on ji.custom_id=joc.custom_id inner join jy_agreementtoorder ja on ji.shiping_order_id=ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca on ja.agreement_id=jca.agreement_id where jca.agreement_type=1 and send_type!=0
and jca.car_number1 like"%${_parameter}%"

SELECT ji.* FROM jy_shiping_order ji where (ji.shipping_order_state=0 OR ji.shipping_order_state=2) AND ji.send_type!=0
and ji.shiping_order_num like "%${param3}%"
and ji.send_type like "%${param4}%"
and ji.send_station like "%${param5}%"
and ji.end_address like "%${param6}%"
ORDER BY ji.updatetime DESC limit #{param1},#{param2}

select count(*) from jy_shiping_order where (shipping_order_state=0 OR shipping_order_state=2) AND send_type=1
and shiping_order_num like "%${param1}%"
and send_type like "%${param2}%"
and send_station like "%${param3}%"
and end_address like "%${param4}%"
mapper.insert:
insert into jy_shiping_order ( shiping_order_id, shiping_order_num,
send_station, end_address, send_time, receipt, receipt_tel, receipt_address, goods_name, goods_packing, goods_num, goods_weight, goods_vol, take_fee, send_fee, adorn_fee, trunk_fee, pay_type, transport_pay, remarks, send_type, trade_agency, updatetime, shipping_order, is_recept, custom_id, car_number, custom_name ) values ( #{shiping_order_id}, #{shiping_order_num},
#{send_station}, #{end_address}, #{send_time},
#{receipt}, #{receipt_tel}, #{receipt_address}, #{goods_name}, #{goods_packing}, #{goods_num}, #{goods_weight}, #{goods_vol},
#{take_fee}, #{send_fee}, #{adorn_fee}, #{trunk_fee},
#{pay_type}, #{transport_pay}, #{remarks},
#{send_type},
#{trade_agency},
#{updatetime}, #{shipping_order}, #{is_recept}, #{custom_id}, #{car_number}, #{custom_name} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ji.*, CASE WHEN ji.send_type='0' THEN '客户自提' WHEN ji.send_type='1' THEN '专车送货' WHEN ji.send_type='2' THEN '送货进仓' WHEN ji.send_type='3' THEN '送货上门' WHEN ji.send_type='4' THEN '送货上楼' END AS sendtype, CASE WHEN ji.check_type='0' THEN '发货人门点' WHEN ji.check_type='1' THEN '起运货运站' END AS checktype CASE WHEN ji.shipping_order_state='0' THEN '受理' WHEN ji.shipping_order_state='1' THEN '在途' ji.shipping_order_state='2' THEN '到达'
ji.shipping_order_state='4' THEN '签收' END AS order_state
FROM jy_shiping_order ji
where ji.shipping_order_state=0
and shiping_order_num like "%${param1}%"
and send_station like "%${param2}%"
and end_address like "%${param3}%"
and check_time >=#{param4}
and check_time <=#{param5}
and check_time >=#{param4} and check_time <=#{param5}
ORDER BY ji.updatetime DESC
mapper.delete:
delete from jy_shiping_order where shiping_order_id IN
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT ji.*, jtc.travel_card_id, jtc.plate_number FROM jy_shiping_order ji LEFT JOIN jy_travel_card jtc ON jtc.travel_card_id = ji.car_id where ji.shiping_order_id=#{shiping_order_id}
mapper.update:
update jy_shiping_order
shiping_order_num=#{shiping_order_num}, send_station=#{send_station}, end_address=#{end_address}, send_time=#{send_time},
receipt=#{receipt}, receipt_tel=#{receipt_tel},
receipt_address=#{receipt_address}, goods_name= #{goods_name}, goods_packing= #{goods_packing}, goods_num=#{goods_num}, goods_weight=#{goods_weight}, goods_vol=#{goods_vol},
take_fee=#{take_fee}, send_fee=#{send_fee}, adorn_fee=#{adorn_fee}, trunk_fee=#{trunk_fee},
pay_type=#{pay_type}, transport_pay=#{transport_pay}, remarks=#{remarks},
send_type=#{send_type},
change_address=#{change_address}, trade_agency=#{trade_agency}, creat_type=#{creat_type}, updatetime=#{updatetime}
where shiping_order_id = #{shiping_order_id}
mapper.select:
select * from jy_shiping_order
where shiping_order_num=#{_parameter}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jy_shiping_order
where shiping_order_num=#{_parameter}

SELECT DISTINCT travel_card_id,plate_number FROM jy_travel_card jtc INNER JOIN jy_driver_info jd ON jd.car_id=jtc.travel_card_id where jtc.state=1
and plate_number like "%${_parameter}%"

SELECT ji.*,jso.*, jtc.travel_card_id, jtc.plate_number FROM jy_shiping_order ji LEFT JOIN jy_travel_card jtc ON jtc.travel_card_id = ji.car_id LEFT JOIN jy_sign_order jso ON jso.order_number=ji.shiping_order_num where ji.shiping_order_id=#{shiping_order_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jy_sign_order ( sign_id, order_id, order_number, sign_user, sign_usernumber, sign_userphone, sign_result, actual_number, defect_number, copies_number, sign_remarks, sign_time ) VALUES ( #{sign_id}, #{order_id}, #{order_number}, #{sign_user}, #{sign_usernumber}, #{sign_userphone}, #{sign_result}, #{actual_number}, #{defect_number}, #{copies_number}, #{sign_remarks}, #{sign_time} )

update.if: UPDATE jy_shiping_order SET shipping_order_state='4' WHERE shiping_order_id = "${_parameter}"

mapper.insert:
insert into jy_shiping_order ( shiping_order_id, shiping_order_num,
send_station， end_address, send_time, receipt, receipt_tel, receipt_address, goods_name, goods_packing, goods_num, goods_weight, goods_vol, take_fee, send_fee, adorn_fee, trunk_fee, pay_type, transport_pay, remarks, send_type, trade_agency, updatetime, shipping_order, is_recept, custom_id, car_number, custom_name ) values
( #{item.shiping_order_id}, #{item.shiping_order_num}, #{item.send_station}, #{item.end_address}, #{item.send_time}, #{item.receipt}, #{item.receipt_tel}, #{item.receipt_address}, #{item.goods_name}, #{item.goods_packing}, #{item.goods_num}, #{item.goods_weight}, #{item.goods_vol}, #{item.take_fee}, #{item.send_fee}, #{item.adorn_fee}, #{item.trunk_fee}, #{item.pay_type}, #{item.transport_pay}, #{item.remarks},
#{item.send_type}, #{item.shipping_order_state}, #{item.trade_agency}, #{item.creat_type}, #{item.updatetime}, #{item.shipping_order}, #{item.is_recept}, #{item.custom_id}, #{item.car_number}, #{item.custom_name} )

INSERT INTO jy_signorderimages ( image_id, order_id, imageUrl
) VALUES ( #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jy_shiping_order js LEFT JOIN jy_create_agreement jc ON 1=1 INNER JOIN jy_agreementtoorder ja ON jc.agreement_id=ja.agreement_id AND ja.order_id=js.shiping_order_id WHERE js.shipping_order_state=1 AND jc.car_id=#{_parameter}

SELECT ji.*, jtc.travel_card_id, jtc.plate_number FROM jy_shiping_order ji LEFT JOIN jy_travel_card jtc ON jtc.travel_card_id = ji.car_id where ji.shiping_order_num IN
#{item}
SELECT ji.*, jtc.travel_card_id, jtc.plate_number FROM jy_shiping_order ji LEFT JOIN jy_travel_card jtc ON jtc.travel_card_id = ji.car_id where ji.shiping_order_num=#{_parameter}
